derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from French fabuliste, from Latin fabula (see fable)

means.word_mean: 1. a person who tells or invents fables

auth_sentence.content: So is Julian Fellowes a fantasist or a fabulist?

auth_sentence.content: Tata was a great promiser, a fabulist of possibilities.
